recipesJson.name: Maple Vanilla Custard filled Long John
recipesJson.author: DIYorDIEMixathon
recipesJson.description: Long John filled with rich, creamy maple vanilla custard. Good on shake and vape, great after a week

reviews.text: It's been a while since my eyebrows raised this high from the almost always disappointing shake.  Pretty damn good and I'm sure the steep will make it even  better.  Hit the profile on the nose.  That zepolla is some good shit.
Really nice juice, I found that at 14 days it starts to really shine.

Absolutely delicious!!  Made exactly as per recipe.  After 7 day steep wasn't very fond of it found it a bit muted and zeppola heavy. Put it back to steep and forgot about it.  Found it yesterday a little over 30 days later and it's perfect.  Not an ADV for me as it's a bit rich but with morning coffee or evenings after supper it's perfect. Will be making more!!! Thanks for sharing!!!!!!!

Beautiful combination of ingredients but but that Maple is way too much for me. It gets almost sickeningly sweet yet also a little dry up that high. Cut the maple in half or so to calm that down and let more of the bakery come out, and this almost certainly be a five-star recipe.
This was my intro to FA Maple, and it didn't let me down

Perfect,  I was dubious of this because maple can be a bit try or sickening. But the creamy notes really mellow it.  There's not really much note wise to add to this review.  It tastes exactly like the description.  Thick cream with mellow smooth maple flavour,  with a plain doughnut throughout. Going to try mixing this with banana.

pageContext.name: Maple Vanilla Custard filled Long John
